name: Hultafors Felling Axe HY 20
description: Ready for small-scale felling, lopping branches or other axely duties, the Felling Axe HY 20 is affordable way to enjoy Hulatfors quality craftsmanship.  The ergonomic hickory haft is comfortable in your hand and offers an excellent mechanical advantage. Known for quality craftsmanship, a Hultafors axe will serve for generations.Head has clear lacquer to ward off corrosion.Head hung using a standard eye to haft mount that's easy to replace (the head will outlast the handle).Heat-treated axe head is softer towards the handle and harder along the edge.Tough hickory haft provides a surprising amount of mechanical advantage for its size.Classic linseed oil finish.Hultafors axe heads feature a lifetime warranty.
